mapper.update: update TTS_SCLTXXCJ_CPPCHC_V2 set HCZSM = #{hczsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HCID = #{hcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDI_CHECK = #{mediCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDI_RESULT = #{mediResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_AMOUNT = #{productAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STORE_COUNT = #{storeCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HARVEST_TIME = #{harvestTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRODUCT_PC = #{productPc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_PC_NEW = #{productPcNew,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HARVEST_BASEID = #{harvestBaseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HARVEST_BASENAME = #{harvestBasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_INNER_KEY = #{productInnerKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_SOURCE = #{productSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROMZSM = #{fromzsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_STRATRUS = #{billStratrus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SHORT_CODE = #{shortCode,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROOF_NUMBER = #{proofNumber,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FROM_SHORT_CODE = #{fromShortCode,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SOURCE_ENTITY = , #{sourceEntity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID , HCZSM , HCID , PRODUCT_ID , PRODUCT_NAME , MEDI_CHECK , MEDI_RESULT , PRODUCT_AMOUNT , STORE_COUNT , HARVEST_TIME , PRODUCT_PC , PRODUCT_PC_NEW , HARVEST_BASEID , HARVEST_BASENAME , PRODUCT_INNER_KEY , PRODUCT_SOURCE , FROMZSM , STATUS , BILL_STRATRUS , DEL_FLAG , CREATE_BY , UPDATE_BY , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_TIME , SHORT_CODE , PROOF_NUMBER , FROM_SHORT_CODE , SOURCE_ENTITY from TTS_SCLTXXCJ_CPPCHC_V2 where ID =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
